entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
